profileAlternative.name: Gerard Smyth
profileAlternative.headline: IT Systems Analyst and SQL Developer at Iceland Foods
profileAlternative.summary:
I have over 4 years experience as an IT/Ecommerce Systems analyst and I have learned a lot of new skills such as;

- SQL Server
- SQL Development
- RabbitMQ
- WebDAV (Integration)
- Hybris Platform
- Analytics (google/adobe)


I have been apart of a fast paced ecommerce department and have contributed to the growth of not only the online platform, but the business as a whole.

In my spare time, I write, produce, film, and promote my own comedy youtube videos. I have been doing this now for three years and I have gained a wealth of skills and experience in video editing and marketing.

positions.title: Iceland Foods
positions.description:
I Troubleshoot website and database (intergration) issues. I work on a multitude of software platforms.
My work day to day can range from troubleshooting known website and data issues to developing and improving our back-end systems and processes.

I use my skills and knowledge of SQL, XML, Hybris, WebDAV, Excel, Databases, AS400, RabbitMQ, Web Services, JSON

roles.title: IT Systems Analyst and SQL Developer

positions.title:
Title
Ecommerce Systems Analyst
positions.description:
My responsibilities were to look after the backend processes of the online platform, both data and infrastructure. I would provide support to the wider business to fix data and software issues and provide supports to senior members of the business.

I would my skills and knowledge of SQL, XML. Hybris, WebDAV, Excel, Databases, AS400
…

positions.title: Comedy Youtuber
positions.description: In my spare time, I write, produce, film, and promote my own comedy youtube videos. I have been doing this now for three years and I have gained a wealth of skills and experience in video editing and marketing.

positions.title: Sales Assistant
positions.description: At Nike I was a footwear specialist and would advise customers what shoe to wear depending on what activity they are doing and how they run/move

positions.title: Team Member
positions.description: In this role I have trained staff whilst performing other key roles within the company.

positions.title: Technical Adviser
positions.description: My job role at Digital UK was to take calls from customers that were having problems in receiving a television signal. This job improved my problem solving skills and gave me the confidence to get my point across to a customer clearer and more concise.

positions.title: Junior Programmer
positions.description: During my time at rECOrd my responsibilities were to create a new animal mapping system which is based upon coordinates and known whereabouts of animals. I achieved this by working in a small team to program a new system which generates a map and locations of animals based on a postcode entered in by the user.

positions.title: Kitchen Staff
positions.description: Worked in a production line to provide an excellent standard of customer service

educations.title: Ellesmere Port Catholic High School (Sixth Form)
